item.description:
We are a raw vegan cafe offering delicious, high quality, raw vegan meals. We support local farms and seek out the very best organic ingredients from socially and environmentally conscious suppliers.

We are committed to quality and want to share our passion for good food with the community.

We refrain from using gluten, soy, sugar, honey, mushrooms and all animal products. All our packaging is compostable or reusable. Revitalive is truly living foods that offers real healing solutions that taste GREAT!

Revitalive Cafe also offers everything to-go so you can integrate raw food easily into your busy life. www.revitalivecafe.com

Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy!

This event is also posted on: meetup.com/rawyum
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask to be seated with Meetup, introduce yourself to the group, and enjoy!
item.name: Revitalive Cafe (3rd_Sat.)
